pr_title: Allow custom keystore and truststore types

timeline.author: Lewuathe

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            ``SSLTrustStoreType``                  The type of the TrustStore..
          
          
            
            ``SSLTrustStoreType``                  The type of the TrustStore.
timeline.author: Lewuathe
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -100,9 +100,11 @@ Name                                   Description
 ``SSLKeyStorePath``                    The location of the Java KeyStore file that contains the certificate
                                        and private key to use for authentication.
 ``SSLKeyStorePassword``                The password for the KeyStore.
+``SSLKeyStoreType``                    The type of the KeyStore.
 ``SSLTrustStorePath``                  The location of the Java TrustStore file to use.
                                        to validate HTTPS server certificates.
 ``SSLTrustStorePassword``              The password for the TrustStore.
+``SSLTrustStoreType``                  The type of the TrustStore..

timeline.bodyText: We can put the default key store name JKS or just saying "The default key store is provided by the Java security property files".
timeline.author: Lewuathe
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -100,9 +100,11 @@ Name                                   Description
 ``SSLKeyStorePath``                    The location of the Java KeyStore file that contains the certificate
                                        and private key to use for authentication.
 ``SSLKeyStorePassword``                The password for the KeyStore.
+``SSLKeyStoreType``                    The type of the KeyStore.

timeline.message: Allow custom keystore and truststore types
Allow custom keystore and truststore types
